instructions: Copy each ability object and paste it as a new document in Firebase Console > Firestore > abilities collection. Use the 'id' field as the Document ID.

lucky_reroll.name: Lucky Reroll
lucky_reroll.description: Reroll one die of your choice
lucky_reroll.longDescription: Select any die from your roll and reroll it once. Perfect for turning a bust into a scoring roll.

focus_shot.name: Focus Shot
focus_shot.description: Next roll adds +1 to all dice
focus_shot.longDescription: Your next dice roll will have +1 added to each die result. Can turn average rolls into great ones.

shield_wall.name: Shield Wall
shield_wall.longDescription: Creates a protective barrier that completely negates the next ability used against you.

aura_siphon.name: Aura Siphon
aura_siphon.longDescription: Drain aura energy from your opponent and add it to your own pool. Great for setting up combos.

double_down.name: Double Down
double_down.longDescription: Roll your dice twice and choose which result to keep. Perfect for high-risk, high-reward situations.

steady_hand.name: Steady Hand
steady_hand.longDescription: Ensure stability by preventing your next three rolls from showing any 1s. Great for avoiding busts.

quick_boost.name: Quick Boost
quick_boost.longDescription: Speed up your recovery time by reducing all ability cooldowns. Perfect for aggressive play.

precision_strike.name: Precision Strike
precision_strike.description: Choose exact value for next die
precision_strike.longDescription: Take complete control and set exactly what your next die will show. Ultimate precision.

time_warp.name: Time Warp
time_warp.longDescription: Bend time to your will and take another turn right now. The ultimate momentum shifter.

score_shield.name: Score Shield
score_shield.longDescription: Create an impenetrable barrier around your score that prevents any score-reducing effects.

momentum_shift.name: Momentum Shift
momentum_shift.longDescription: Dramatically alter the game by exchanging your current score with your opponent's score.

chain_reaction.name: Chain Reaction
chain_reaction.longDescription: Build momentum with each roll, gaining increasing bonuses for consecutive successful rolls.

mirror_force.name: Mirror Force
mirror_force.description: Reflect next ability back to opponent
mirror_force.longDescription: Create a reflective barrier that bounces the next ability used against you back at your opponent.

aura_storm.name: Aura Storm
aura_storm.description: Gain aura equal to current score
aura_storm.longDescription: Convert your success into raw energy, gaining aura points equal to your current score.

dice_mastery.name: Dice Mastery
dice_mastery.description: All dice show 4+ for next 3 rolls
dice_mastery.longDescription: Achieve perfect dice control, ensuring every die shows at least 4 for your next three rolls.

grand_slam.name: Grand Slam
grand_slam.longDescription: Channel immense power into your next scoring roll, making it count for three times its normal value.

phoenix_rise.name: Phoenix Rise
phoenix_rise.longDescription: Rise from the ashes of defeat. If your score is critically low, restore it to a respectable 25 points.

temporal_echo.name: Temporal Echo
temporal_echo.longDescription: Echo through time to repeat your previous turn's actions and results exactly as they happened.

ability_theft.name: Ability Theft
ability_theft.description: Copy and use opponent's last ability
ability_theft.longDescription: Master the art of mimicry by copying your opponent's most recently used ability and using it against them.

dice_storm.name: Dice Storm
dice_storm.longDescription: Unleash a tempest of dice, rolling ten and selecting the six best results for maximum potential.

reality_shift.name: Reality Shift
reality_shift.description: Change opponent's last roll to all 1s
reality_shift.longDescription: Alter the fabric of reality itself, retroactively changing your opponent's last roll to complete failure.

perfect_balance.name: Perfect Balance
perfect_balance.longDescription: Restore balance to the universe by setting both players' scores to the average of their current totals.

absolute_power.name: Absolute Power
absolute_power.description: All dice show 6 for next roll
absolute_power.longDescription: Achieve the ultimate in dice control, ensuring every single die shows a perfect 6 on your next roll.

grand_theft.name: Grand Theft
grand_theft.longDescription: Master thief of abilities! Permanently steal your opponent's most powerful loaded ability for this match.

time_master.name: Time Master
time_master.longDescription: Achieve ultimate temporal control by rewinding the game state back three complete turns.

dice_god.name: Dice God
dice_god.description: Control all dice for rest of match
dice_god.longDescription: Ascend to divine status with complete control over all dice results for the remainder of the match.

aura_singularity.name: Aura Singularity
aura_singularity.longDescription: Create a singularity of pure energy, granting unlimited aura for five turns to unleash devastating combinations.
